name: Crunch Berries
description: Bred by Exotic Genetix, Crunch Berries is a cross between DJ Shortâ€™s famous Blueberry and a male Triple OG. With two famous strains in the mix, Crunch Berries will surely offer something unique. This delicious strain has an OG gassy terpene profile backed by a sweet blueberry influence. Crunch Berries is perfect for a sunny day in the park or a hike in the woods.
